children.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

fullName.value: Xunit.v3.TestMethodRunner(Of TContext, TTestMethod, TTestCase).FailTestCase(TContext, TTestCase, System.Exception)

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<RunSummary> FailTestCase(TContext ctxt, TTestCase testCase, Exception exception)
Protected Overridable Function FailTestCase(ctxt As TContext, testCase As TTestCase, exception As Exception) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method
The test case to be failed.
The exception that was caused during startup.

return.description: Returns summary information about the test case run.

children.remarks: By default, uses to fail the test cases.
children.summary: Override this method to fail an individual test case.

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<bool> OnTestMethodCleanupFailure(TContext ctxt, Exception exception)
Protected Overridable Function OnTestMethodCleanupFailure(ctxt As TContext, exception As Exception) As ValueTask(Of Boolean)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method
The exception that caused the cleanup failure (may be an instance of if more than one exception occurred).

return.description: Return true if test execution should continue; false if it should be shut down.

children.remarks: This method runs during and any exceptions thrown are converted into fatal exception messages (via ) and sent to the message bus in ctxt.
children.summary: This method is called when an exception was thrown while cleaning up, after the test method has run. By default, this sends .

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<bool> OnTestMethodFinished(TContext ctxt, RunSummary summary)
Protected Overridable Function OnTestMethodFinished(ctxt As TContext, summary As RunSummary) As ValueTask(Of Boolean)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method
The execution summary for the test method

return.description: Return true if test execution should continue; false if it should be shut down.

children.remarks: This method runs during and any exceptions thrown will contribute to test method cleanup failure.
children.summary: This method will be called when the test method has finished running. By default, this sends . Override this to enable any extensibility related to test method finish.

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<bool> OnTestMethodStarting(TContext ctxt)
Protected Overridable Function OnTestMethodStarting(ctxt As TContext) As ValueTask(Of Boolean)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method

return.description: Return true if test execution should continue; false if it should be shut down.

children.remarks: This method runs during and any exceptions thrown will contribute to test method failure (and will prevent the test method from running). Even if this method records exceptions, will be called.
children.summary: This method will be called before the test method has started running. By default, this sends . Override this to enable any extensibility related to test method start.

content.value: protected ValueTask<RunSummary> Run(TContext ctxt)
Protected Function Run(ctxt As TContext) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method

return.description: Returns summary information about the tests that were run.

children.summary: Runs the tests in the test method.

content.value: protected abstract ValueTask<RunSummary> RunTestCase(TContext ctxt, TTestCase testCase)
Protected MustOverride Function RunTestCase(ctxt As TContext, testCase As TTestCase) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method
The test case to be run.

return.description: Returns summary information about the test case run.

children.summary: Override this method to run an individual test case.

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<RunSummary> RunTestCases(TContext ctxt, Exception? exception)
Protected Overridable Function RunTestCases(ctxt As TContext, exception As Exception) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method
The exception that was caused during startup; should be used as an indicator that the downstream tests should fail with the provided exception rather than going through standard execution

return.description: Returns summary information about the tests that were run.

children.summary: Runs the list of test cases. By default, it runs the cases in order, synchronously.

content.value: protected virtual void SetTestContext(TContext ctxt, TestEngineStatus testMethodStatus)
Protected Overridable Sub SetTestContext(ctxt As TContext, testMethodStatus As TestEngineStatus)

parameters.description: The context that describes the current test method

children.remarks: This method must never throw. Behavior is undefined if it does. Instead, exceptions that occur should be recorded in the aggregator in ctxt and will be reflected in a way that's appropriate based on when this method is called.
children.summary: Sets the current for the current test method and the given test method status.

summary: A base class that provides default behavior when running tests in a test method.

content.value: public abstract class TestMethodRunner<TContext, TTestMethod, TTestCase> where TContext : TestMethodRunnerContext<TTestMethod, TTestCase> where TTestMethod : class, ITestMethod where TTestCase : class, ITestCase
Public MustInherit Class TestMethodRunner(Of TContext As TestMethodRunnerContext(Of TTestMethod, TTestCase), TTestMethod As {Class, ITestMethod}, TTestCase As {Class, ITestCase})

typeParameters.description: The context type used by the runner
The type of the test method used by the test framework. Must derive from .
The type of the test case used by the test framework. Must derive from .
